page.title: 01 Local History Present Day
page.content: Our area is an agricultural area with mainly arable farming .It is situated in south of Warwickshire and is part of the area which in earlier times was called The Feldon.It still reflects this description although there are still very limited wooded areas. We have three residential area those of Pillerton Hersey,Pillerton Priors and Fulready.Although farming the area very few of the population is involved in the industry. The population is divided between the retired and those whose occupation take them away from the villages during the day .Pillerton Priors in particular could be described as a dormitory for the surrounding towns.
